name: Crafting Guide For Minecraft
description:
Ever forgot a recipe when you need to Craft something? Well this is the app for you!

This is a Ultimate Minecraft guide, containing a Crafting Guide and also a Quiz to test what you know about Minecraft.

Features:
-A complete guide for Crafting in Minecraft.
-Quiz, a quiz to test your knowledge about Minecraft.

Disclaimer:
This is an unofficial guide to Minecraft, note that this app is not associated in any way to the Minecraft trademark.
